page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE....
page.content: A day in the life of a handicapped group. In the morning we get picked up by our transport, which is either a minibus or a taxi. The school day commences at 9.30 a.m. and on arrival at school we either disperse into our groups or go to physiotherapy. Our first break is at 10.30a.m.,this lasts for 15 minutes then we go back to our groups. At 11.50a.m. we have lunch,this lasts for 40 minutes after which we either go to physio or out onto the playground. After lunch we go back to our lessons which involves a lot of computer work. We have a short break at 2.15p.m. for about 5 minutes. The school has assembly at 3.10p.m. for 20 minutes and then we are picked up by our transport and taken home. Our lessons include maths,english and typing,a lot is being done on Domesday
